$theme.description: Main color theme. E.g. used for background for body and sidebar.

$fluent-halo-opacity.description: Opacity of the light from a Fluent button when hovering.

$fluent-halo-color.description: Color of lightning on a Fluent button element.

$shimmering.description: Alpha value (RGBA) e.g. for header background.

$normal-size.description: Default size for many components, like sidebar menu items.

$actions-height.description: Height of actions menu when it is expanded, like on mobile devices.

$bla-button-bg-normal.description: Background color of menu toggle button.

$bla-button-bg-hover.description: Background color of menu toggle button on hover state.

$bla-btn-font-size.description: Font size for sidebar menu items.

$bla-header-logo-font-size.description: Font size for app title on the header.

$sidebar-open-bg.description: Background of sidebar when it's opened (on mobile devices).

$sidebar-deep-bg.description: Background of sidebar menu dropdown menus

$sidebar-indicator-color.description: Color of indicator for active sidebar item.

$sidebar-control-bg-hover.description: Background color, when hovering sidebar menu item.

$sidebar-search-bg.description: Background of search control in sidebar.

$actions-control-bg-hover.description: Background color, when hovering action menu item.
